## Summary
One-sentence summary of the feature or improvement you would like to see.

## Problem it solves
Explain the use case or pain point this addresses.

## Proposed solution
Outline the high-level behavior you expect (no full design required). Include UI/UX or API considerations if applicable.

## Alternatives considered
List any alternative approaches or workarounds you have evaluated.

## Additional context
Add diagrams, links, or supporting details that help explain the request.
